properties.site-address: Elm Street, Hollingwood, Brimington,
properties.notes: The site has been occupied by a permanent structure but the remains have not sufficiently blended into the landscape over the process of time. Whilst nearby schools are at capacity certain types of residential development would be possible without an increase in demand for school places. Furthermore the potential for expansion of the nearby schools is as yet undetermined. The site has constraints but they appear to be mitigable and the site is appropriate for residential development.

properties.site-address: Red House HOP & Spire Lodge, Sheffield Road, Chesterfield
properties.ownership: owned by a public authority

The constraints posed by Sheffield Road to the west is not significant. Other identified constraints are likely to be mitigable.

properties.site-address: Ash Glen Nursery (Former), Sheffield Road, Unstone
properties.notes: The site is not essential to ensuring an adequate supply of employment land or premises in terms of quantity or quality. There is a need for further information on the relationship with adjoining commercial/industrial land uses and whether or not a good level of amenity might be feasible should adjoining land uses continue in commercial/industrial use. The site is not within walking distance of a centre and is not within a Regeneration Priority Area. There is insuffiicent information on the adequacy of education and GP provision in the locality.

properties.site-address: Brockwell Court (Former), Cheedale Avenue, Newbold, Chesterfield
properties.ownership: owned by a public authority
properties.notes: The site has been occupied by a permanent structure but the remains have not sufficiently blended into the landscape over the process of time. There is a possibility that the site may be required to meet unmet open space needs but there is no conclusive evidence to this effect, Whilst the nearby junior school is at capacity certain types of residential development would be possible without an increase in demand for school places. Furthermore the potential for expansion of the nearby schools is as yet undetermined. Provided biodiversity impacts can be mitigated the site would be appropriate for residential development.
